USE (and other incremental variables) must be calculated just like other
variables, but they're concatenated later.

>>> etc/portage/make.profile -> ../../overlay/profiles/default

>>> overlay/profiles/default/parent
../1
../2

>>> overlay/profiles/default/make.defaults
SAVED_USE="$USE"

>>> overlay/profiles/1/make.defaults
USE="$USE a b"

>>> overlay/profiles/2/make.defaults
USE="$USE -a c d"

>>> expect.vars
SAVED_USE=" a b -a c d"
USE="b c d"
